mapper.select: SELECT `friend_request`.*, `users`.id as user_id, `users`.name as user_name, `users`.head as user_head, `users`.status as user_status, `users`.school as user_school FROM `friend_request` LEFT JOIN `users` ON `friend_request`.user_id = `users`.id WHERE `friend_request`.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY `friend_request`.create_time DESC
